overview:
Kevin is co-founder of flexjex.com where he is responsible for business development, sales and marketing, strategy and anything else non-technical.

Prior to that he spent 3.5 years as a strategy consultant at Mars & Co. He worked on projects primarily in the Consumer Goods sector for blue-chip clients; especially Sales and Distribution system design and optimization and M&A work. Extensive international work included 6-months on the ground in Russia, a 6-month secondment to the firm’s New York office and numerous European assignments.

Kevin holds an MA and MEng in Mechanical Engineering from the University of Cambridge and completed postgraduate studies on ACDMM at the Institute for Manufacture, Cambridge.
